events.message: I received the wrong size for my recent order and would like to request a refund for this item.
The system has identified this case as related to a refund request based on the customer's description.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrectly sized item.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand you want a refund for the wrong sized item. Let me help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to process your refund efficiently?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing that the size is indeed different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to appear.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund.
The refund process has been completed on our end. Please check your bank account in a few days to confirm the refund arrival.
Following up to confirm if you have received the refund for your returned order and if everything is satisfactory.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you very much for the efficient handling of my issue.
We are closing this case now. If you have any other questions or issues, feel free to reach out again.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our services.
